The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 15 August is 62,103 (7,157.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 August, there were 2,553 new confirmed cases (294.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 August, there were 2,330 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 10% (223 extra cases).
